item.title: Graffitti on buildings, 23rd June
item.description:
Huge damage to this area of the square. Please address urgently. You need a category for graffiti on Walls - it is the most common and extensive form yet you do not have a category. Please amend - it is blighting the neighbourhood.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Portman Square, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 43-45 Portman square, 23rd June

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Portman Square, Marylebone, London
